title: Three dead after light plane crashes into ocean off South Australian beach
summary_full: Single-engine Cessna crashed into water at Long Bay near Goolwa South on Friday afternoonGet our breaking news email, free app or daily news podcastThree people have died after a light plane crashed into the ocean near Goolwa South in South Australia on Friday.Police responded to reports of the small plane crashing into the water at Long Bay about 4.20pm, with emergency services responding to the area immediately.
